io.werval.util

Class Hashids.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.util.Hashids.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Hashids 

    public static final class Hashids.Builder
extends Object
    Hashids Builder.

    Immutable, reusable builder. Each method return a new builder instance.

    Defaults are no salt, Hashids.DEFAULT_ALPHABET, no minimum length and Hashids.DEFAULT_SEPARATORS.
